mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of James M. Kelley Until 09.14.1898 when he reached 21 years of age
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of James M. Kelley Until 09.14.1898 when he reached 21 years of age Moses G. Kelley, Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 5, Folio 55, in the Floyd County Courthouse. Date recorded as April 7th, 1899 term
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
